# load packages

```{r}
library(terra)
library(d6geodata)
```


use `{d6geodata}` package

```{r install}
temp <- d6geodata::temp_ras(1000)
values(temp) <- 1

plot(temp)
```

make a multiple/expand for eurogrid

```{r}
ncell(terra::extend(temp, 1))

temp_exp <- terra::extend(temp, 100)


temp_exp_m <- mask(temp, temp_exp, inverse = T)
```

